meanings.definition: A list of movies or television shows in which an actor or director has appeared or worked on.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy looking at the filmography of my favorite actor to see all the movies they have been in.
meanings.sent2: Her filmography includes a mix of action films and romantic comedies.
meanings.sent3: When the director lost his filmography, he couldn't remember which movies he had worked on.
meanings.sent4: The filmography of the actor was like a treasure map leading to their best performances.
meanings.sent5: The filmography of the actress was so extensive that it felt like a journey through different genres.

meanings.definition: The study or analysis of films as a form of art or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: His interest in filmography led him to pursue a degree in film studies.
meanings.sent2: The professor's deep knowledge of filmography made his lectures engaging.
meanings.sent3: The filmography of horror movies kept the film critic up at night.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the filmography of classic films is like diving into a time capsule.
meanings.sent5: The filmography of animated movies revealed the evolution of storytelling through visuals.
